programnature wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> Just started using heritrix a few days ago. I was able to try a few smaller crawls and learned 
> how to use the regexp features to crawl what I want.
> 
> Now I wanted to try something with allmusic.com, and nothing happens. The seed report 
> reads "Not Crawled" for all the seed, with either 0 or -1 leading.
> 
> Any insight?
> 
> Looking at their robots.txt I don't see anything that would kill it immediately. And I tried 
> setting it to ignore robots.txt anyway.
> 
> Thanks for any response...

When I last looked closely at AllMusic.com several years ago, it 
appeared they had a deliberately obfuscated Javascript-based system of 
page-to-page navigation designed to thwart scrapers and crawlers and 
prevent any 'deep-linking' to specific pages at stable URLs. I suspect 
that remains the problem today.

- Gordon @ IA
